titles.title: Alice Paul Congressional Gold Medal Act
A bill to posthumously award a Congressional gold medal to Alice Paul in recognition of her role in the women's suffrage movement and in advancing equal rights for women.
Alice Paul Congressional Gold Medal Act

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Banking, Housing, and Urban Affairs.

committee.name: Senate Banking, Housing, and Urban Affairs

term.name: Civil Rights and Liberties, Minority Issues

bill.summary: Alice Paul Congressional Gold Medal Act - Provides for the posthumous presentation of a congressional gold medal to Alice Paul in recognition of her role in the women's suffrage movement and in advancing equal rights for women.
